text.jpText:
『天皇賞（春）』当日。観客は
セイウンスカイとスペシャルウィークの
対決に心躍らせていた。
text.enText:
It was the day of "Tennou-sho (Spring). 
On the day of "Tennou-sho (Spring)," 
spectators were excited to see Seiunsky 
and Special Week face off.

text.jpText:
いつになく真剣な様子のセイウンスカイ。
トレーナーの応援に照れながらも、
集中を深めていくのだった。
text.enText:
Seiunsky looking more serious than ever. She 
was embarrassed by the trainer's cheering. 
the trainer's cheering, she was deepening her 
concentration.
